controller

Class LandController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.LandController

  • public class LandController
extends java.lang.Object
    LandController is the controller class for My Farm function

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LandController()
      Creates LandController object and initialize landList with land data from LandDAO

        Get the crop's growth progress on this land

      • updateLand

        public void updateLand(Seed seed,
                       Land land,
                       CropController cropCtrl)
        Update the land information after player has plant seed
        Parameters:
        seed - the seed that was planted
        land - the land to be updated
        cropCtrl - to retrieve the crop based on the planted seed

      • harvestCrop

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> harvestCrop(Player player,
                                                                                                             CropController cropCtrl,
                                                                                                             PlayerController playerCtrl,
                                                                                                             RankController rankCtrl)
        Harvest the crop upon maturity
        Parameters:
        player - the player who wants to harvest
        cropCtrl - to retrieve the crop
        playerCtrl - to retrieve playerList and update player rank based on experience points gained
        rankCtrl - to update player rank after harvesting based on experience points gained
        Returns:
        three HashMap of the harvested crop details (units, gold, experience harvested)

      • clearLand

        public boolean clearLand(Player player,
                         Land land,
                         PlayerController playerCtrl)
        Clear the land for the player when crop wilted
        Parameters:
        player - the player who wish to clear the land
        land - the land to be cleared
        playerCtrl - to retrieve playerList
        Returns:
        true if land is able to clear; false if land is unable to clear
